A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A good stand alone movie with great acting by main characters and an interesting plot line. That being said\, it's a horrible star wars movie. Completely takes a dump on all the Star Wars mythos that came before it with the original trilogy AND takes a dump on the direction of The Force Awakens. I was sitting there at the end thinking WTF?? And WHY???  Bottom line\, if you're not a Star Wars fan (like my wife)\, you'll love it. If you are a Star Wars fan (like me)\, it will disappoint\, especially with Luke.
